sentences.sContent: She was very old and barely able to walk.
sentences.sCn: 她年纪非常大，只能勉强走几步路。

sentences.sContent: Mary had barely enough money to live on.
sentences.sCn: 玛丽的钱只够勉强度日。

sentences.sContent: She was barely aware of his presence.
sentences.sCn: 她几乎没有注意到他的存在。

synos.tran: 仅仅，勉强；几乎不；公开地；贫乏地

trans.tranOther: only with great difficulty or effort
